Killeen.Killeen High School: Killeen High School is a 6A public high school located in Killeen, Texas (USA). It is one of four high schools in the Killeen Independent School District located in western Bell County. Killeen High School was first known as Fort Hood High School after the establishment of then Camp Hood during World War II. In 2011, the school was rated "Academically Acceptable" by the Texas Education Agency.
